alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:41AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 inch Utah Valley, up to 2 inches Sanpete Valley. * WHERE...Utah Valley and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Periodic winter driving conditions will be possible through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
